and the Philadelphia 76ers keep winning. One night after a 41-point effort in Philadelphia's most lopsided win of the season, Allen Iverson scored an NBA season-high and career-best 54 in a 107-103 victory over the Cleveland Cavaliers. It was like he was playing horse tonight, said 76ers guard Aaron McKie , who had 20 points and nine assists.`` His jumper was deadly.'' While lawyers say more celebrities are about to accuse journalists of hacking their phones, Deputy Tony Blair Nick Clegg sought to draw a line under the controversy. I don't think this government will miss a beat in terms of just pressing ahead with the plan that we have set out for the next four and a half years, he told the BBC.`` Andy Coulson has been very clear that he was not in any way responsible for phone hacking or had any knowledge of it. I have no reason to disbelieve him.''
